There is no doubt that those who want to control and dominate us through the control of our money, food and education  are rooted in evil. They will lie, cheat, steal, or whatever it takes to satisfy their love of money. However, they will never be satisfied. It’s not just money they desire, it’s more than money, it’s the power associated with money.
Power to control and dominate.
-
Numerous times in our history, private banks have attempted to control and dominate.
-

When you control your own wealth, you hold a measure of independence from the monopoly of the state ie; sending children to a private school and avoiding the brainwashing of the public education system.
-
We are an enemy of ourselves
-
“Give me control of a nation’s money and I care not who makes her laws.” – Mayer Rothschild
